backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for key frontend components and configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, theme variables, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main interactive UI with name input, yes/no logic, movable No button, animations, audio, and success dialog.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Generates and animates 100 falling confetti particles.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Creates looping floating heart animations rising from the bottom.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for Internet Identity login, state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH color variables, including Valentine theme colors and dark mode variants, plus utility classes for themed backgrounds and text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCHâ€‘based color variables, fonts, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, including versioning, implemented features, pending feature requests, and a summary of the Valentine app state.
